snippet: More people who gave their last address as outside the city are entering its shelter system, but advocates say the estimate of those people’s numbers is unverified and distorting.
abstract: More people who gave their last address as outside New York City are entering its shelter system, but advocates say the estimate of those people’s numbers is unverified and distorting.
lead_paragraph: More people who gave their last address as outside the city are entering its shelter system, but advocates say the estimate of those people’s numbers is unverified and distorting.

headline.seo: New York as ‘Safety Net’ for Out-of-Town Homeless
headline.main: City’s Sheltering of Out-of-Town Homeless, and Mayor’s Remark, Stir Debate
headline.print_headline: City’s Sheltering of Out-of-Town Homeless, and Mayor’s Remark, Stir Debate
